title: Similarity between Russian and Chinese Revolutions

content.question: Which of the following best describes a similarity between the Russian Revolutions of 1917 and the Chinese Revolution of 1911 ?

choices.label: Both were initiated in response to invasions by foreign powers.
Both gained the support of government reformers holding high bureaucratic positions.
Both were led by members of the working classes who had risen through the ranks of labor unions.
Both were able to gain support because of the ineffectiveness and corruption of the existing monarchies.

content.answer: Both were able to gain support because of the ineffectiveness and corruption of the existing monarchies.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
